data.name: Chambara
data.detailed_description:
Chambara is a universe you have never seen before — and if you are not careful, you’ll never see your foes either. Hide in the shadows and strike from the light in a dazzling black and white world. This nail-biting competitive stealth brawler will be your home for unforgettable local multiplayer.

Play locally in intense 1-on-1 matches, or party up for 2v2 across 9 unique maps! Master your shuriken snare to trap your opponents before dealing a deadly blow with your sword, or your umbrella, or your… fish?? The world is striking, and so must you! Customize your outfit and weapon, but make sure your stylish hat doesn’t give you away!

Chambara features full controller support outside of the launcher. All major Xinput gamepads are supported.
data.about_the_game:
Chambara is a universe you have never seen before — and if you are not careful, you’ll never see your foes either. Hide in the shadows and strike from the light in a dazzling black and white world. This nail-biting competitive stealth brawler will be your home for unforgettable local multiplayer.

Play locally in intense 1-on-1 matches, or party up for 2v2 across 9 unique maps! Master your shuriken snare to trap your opponents before dealing a deadly blow with your sword, or your umbrella, or your… fish?? The world is striking, and so must you! Customize your outfit and weapon, but make sure your stylish hat doesn’t give you away!

data.short_description: The award-winning couch-multiplayer stealth brawler comes to PC! Duel in a black and white world where foes can come from anywhere!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any from the last 4 years
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with Shader Model 3 support, 2GB video memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS Yosemite
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS Sierra, High Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with Shader Model 3 support, 2GB video memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
